tool_description: This API is perfect for integration into educational platforms, coding challenge websites, project management tools, and personal development environments. It offers a dynamic and user-friendly way to enhance the coding experience
name: RandomCodeAPI
title: RandomCodeAPI

api_list.name: GET Challenge by Difficulty
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://randomcodeapi.p.rapidapi.com/challenges/difficulty/Medium"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "randomcodeapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
